Text:
Contents of K-Lite Mega Codec Pack

Below you can find a list of all components that are included in the pack. Please note that not all of these components will be installed. There are some groups of two (or more) components that share a similar purpose. During installation at most one component from each group can be selected. Furthermore, some of the included components are not needed by the average user, and therefore they will not by installed by default. The installer is fully customizable, so you can let it install exactly those components that suit your specific needs.

Contents of version 8.3.2:

Player:

    Media Player Classic Homecinema [version 1.6.1.4041]
    Media Player Classic Homecinema [version 1.2.1008.0]
    Media Player Classic [version 6.4.9.1 rev. 107]

DirectShow video decoding filters:

    ffdshow [version 1.1.4307]
    LAV Video [version 0.45 build 2012-02-06]
    XviD [version 1.3.2]
    On2 VP7 [version 7.0.10.0]
    DScaler5 MPEG-2 decoder [version 0.0.6.0 IVTC mod]

DirectShow audio decoding filters:

    ffdshow [version 1.1.4307]
    LAV Audio [version 0.45 build 2012-02-06]
    AC3Filter [version 1.63b]
    MONOGRAM AAC decoder [version 0.9.6.0]

DirectShow audio parsers:

    madFLAC [version 1.10]
    CoreWavPack [version 1.1.1]
    MusePack (MONOGRAM) [version 0.9.2.0 | 0.4.0.0]
    Monkey's Audio (DCoder) [version 1.0]
    OptimFROG (RadLight) [version 1.0.0.1]
    AMR (MONOGRAM) [version 1.0.1.0]
    DC-Bass Source [version 1.3.0]
    AC3File [version 0.7b]

DirectShow source filters:

    Haali Media Splitter [version 1.11.288.0]
    LAV Splitter [version 0.45 build 2012-02-06]
    AVI splitter (Gabest) [version 1.6.1.4041]
    CDXA Reader (Gabest) [version 1.6.1.4041]

DirectShow subtitle filter:

    DirectVobSub (a.k.a. VSFilter) [version 2.40.4041.0]

Other filters:

    madVR [version 0.80]
    Haali Video Renderer [version 1.11.288.0]

VFW video codecs:

    ffdshow VFW interface
    XviD [version 1.3.2]
    x264 [revision 2120]
    On2 VP7 [version 7.0.10.0]
    Lagarith [version 1.3.27]
    huffyuv [version 2.1.1 CCE Patch 0.2.5]

ACM audio codecs:

    MP3 (Fraunhofer) [version 3.4.0.0]
    MP3 (LAME) [version 3.98.2]
    AC3ACM [version 2.1]

Tools:

    Codec Tweak Tool [version 5.1.4]
    Win7DSFilterTweaker [version 4.7]
    MediaInfo Lite [version 0.7.53]
    GSpot Codec Information Appliance [version 2.70a]
    VobSubStrip [version 0.11]
    GraphStudioNext [version 0.4.9.0]
    Haali Muxer
    FourCC Changer
If you don't trust this Torrent then you can download it here: http://www.codecguide.com/

Thanks for sharing
